values.name: calm
values.off_msg_char: You have lost your peace of mind.

values.name: detect evil
values.off_msg_char: The red in your vision disappears.

values.name: detect good
values.off_msg_char: The gold in your vision disappears.

values.name: detect hidden
values.off_msg_char: You feel less aware of your surroundings.

values.name: detect invis
values.off_msg_char: You no longer see invisible objects.

values.name: faerie fire
values.off_msg_char: The pink aura around you fades away.

values.name: fly
values.off_msg_char: You slowly float to the ground.

values.name: infravision
values.off_msg_char: You no longer see in the dark.

values.name: sanctuary
values.off_msg_char: The white aura around your body fades.

values.name: shield
values.off_msg_char: Your force shield shimmers then fades away.

values.name: berserk
values.off_msg_char: You feel your pulse slow down.

values.name: dirt kicking
values.off_msg_char: You rub the dirt out of your eyes.
